reference.shortdesc: A figure group organizes segments within a figure.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The figgroup element is useful primarily as a base for complex specializations, such as nestable groups of syntax within a syntax diagram.
The figgroup element can nest; it also can contain multiple cross-references, footnotes, and keywords.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <fig> <title>Sample complex figure</title> <figgroup> <title>First group</title> <ph>These elements</ph> <ph>are grouped together</ph> <ph>for some purpose</ph> </figgroup> <figgroup> <title>Second group</title> <data name="MetaItem" value="13"/> <data name="MetaThing" value="31"/> <ph>These elements</ph> <ph>are grouped with associated metadata</ph> </figgroup> </fig>
